text: Thomas J. Yewcic (May 9, 1932 - October 21, 2020) was an American football quarterback and punter and Major League Baseball player. In football, he played from 1961 to 1966 with the Boston Patriots of the American Football League (AFL). In baseball, he played one game for the Detroit Tigers in 1957. Yewcic was born in Conemaugh, Pennsylvania. He died on October 21, 2020 at the age of 88.Former Patriots quarterback/punter Tom Yewcic dies ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:New England Patriots players Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania Category:Sportspeople from Massachusetts
title: Tom Yewcic
